title: Lauwers (surname)
text: Lauwers is a <a href="Dutch%20language">Dutch</a> surname most common in <a href="Flanders">Flanders</a>.<a href="https%3A//web.archive.org/web/20191022195142/http%3A//www.familienaam.be/"></a> It may be of <a href="patronymic">patronymic</a> origin ("son of <a href="Laurens%20%28given%20name%29">Laurens</a>)" or indicate an occupation ("lawyer").<a href="http%3A//www.meertens.knaw.nl/nfb/detail_naam.php%3Fgba_naam%3DLauwers%26amp%3Bnfd_naam%3DLauwers%26amp%3Binfo%3Ddocumentatie%26amp%3Boperator%3Deq%26amp%3Btaal%3D"></a> People with this surname include:
